name: Mortal Elements
description:
OVERVIEW

Play as Wisker the mage cat finding his way back home through the portal. In order to activate the portal, the mage cat needs assistance from some elemental crystals that would help him unlock the shrine that is the key to opening the portal. 

GOALS

Collect the crystals to active the portal that'll take wisker back home.

PILLARS

Elemental powers 

Puzzles 

Story 

HOOK

Using elemental powers to solve puzzle and navigate through the map.

3 Cs

 

Character 

We play Wisker the cat. He is a fast nimble cat who can cast elemental magic to aid his journey. 

Camera 

Fixed camera with isometric view which follows the player.

Controls

Movement        -    Mouse click / Hold

Ice Spell            -     "Q"

Fire Spell           -     "E"
